ComicInfo.Summary:
Free 1/2 sized, 12 paged preview comic by Wizard Magazine that reintroduces the origin story of Evil Ernie and his connection to Lady Death. Also included is a short story piece explaining Evil Ernie's powers over the dead that he and his minions kills.
It goes on to explain how Lady Death visits him through the corpses of his victims but it has been a long time since that last happened and he is anxious to see her again and is going to find her.
ComicInfo.Title: Prologue (Wizard issue -1)
